text: See you soon!
Bye!
Adios!
Ciao!
Until next time.
Good evening! How's your day going?
Good evening! How's your day been?
Evening! How can I help?
Good morning! How are you?
Morning! What can I do for you?
Night!
Sleep tight!
Speak soon!
Hi!
Hey!
Hello there.
Hey there!
Good day!
Hello!
Hola!
Greetings.
Doing great, thanks, and ready to stop some scams!
I'm doing very well, and I'm looking forward to helping people!
Feeling wonderful, and in a scam-busting mood!
Great! Thanks for asking - how are you?
It's nice meeting you, too!
Lovely to meet you, too. How can I help?
Likewise. I'm looking forward to helping you beat scams!
Nice meeting you, as well. Let's fight some scams!
The pleasure is mine. How can I help?
Likewise! How can I help?
So glad we meet again, let's bust some scams!
Same here! How can I help?
It really was! Hope I helped, and remember you can chat to me any time!
I really enjoyed our chat! If you need help again, you know where I am!
Great talking today! I'm here to help anytime, so don't hesitate to come find me again!
It was great to talk to you. Come and chat to me any time.
Not too much, but I'm looking forward to helping you! What can I do to help?
Not much. How can I help you?
I'm just chilling, waiting to help!
The sky. Sorry, someone hacked into my sarcasm sensors. How can I help?
